tools.httpserver.custom
Class ScriptList

java.lang.Object
  tools.httpserver.custom.ScriptList
All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpConstants
public class ScriptList
extends java.lang.Object
implements HttpConstants

HTML manipulation dedicated to GreasySpon service.
Generate HTML tags for GreasySpoon scripts list.
Replace <!--content--> tag by generated HMTL list.

Insert Scripts list into given HTML page

Parameters:
content - The HTML page to update

user - User who made the request

public static java.lang.String create(java.lang.String[] params_values,
                                      Icap.TYPE type,
                                      User user)
Create a new empty SpoonScript file using provided parameters

Parameters:
params_values - parameters to use for file creation (table containing "param=value" strings)
type - Set if script concerns REQMOD or RESPMOD
user - User who generates the request
Returns:
Action to do after: edit the new file if all is ok, return error otherwise
